## Palette

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

palette <- tibble::tribble(
  ~color, ~palette,
  "#2e2933", "base",
  "#837591", "base",
  "#e9ebe5", "base",
  "#cf597e", "diverging",
  "#e88471", "diverging",
  "#eeb479", "diverging",
  "#e9e29c", "diverging",
  "#9ccb86", "diverging",
  "#39b185", "diverging",
  "#009392", "diverging",
  "#f7feae", "sequential",
  "#b7e6a5", "sequential",
  "#7ccba2", "sequential",
  "#46aea0", "sequential",
  "#089099", "sequential",
  "#00718b", "sequential",
  "#045275", "sequential",
)

palette |> 
  dplyr::mutate(
    color_palette_rank = dplyr::row_number(), .by=palette
  ) |>
  ggplot(aes(x=color_palette_rank, y=forcats::fct_rev(palette), fill=color)) +
  geom_tile(width=1) +
  geom_text(aes(label=color)) +
  scale_fill_identity() +
  coord_equal() +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    axis.title=element_blank(),
    axis.text.x=element_blank(),
    axis.ticks.x=element_blank(),
    panel.grid=element_blank()
  )
```
